properties.description: We offer a drop--in Coffee Morning fortnightly on Thursday 10.30am to 12noon at the Chapel. Everyone is welcome, regularly or occasionally, for friendship, meeting new people and refreshments.
properties.title: Chapel, Week St Mary

properties.description: Open to the public 1-2 pm on FRIDAYS for free tea and coffee and a snack (biscuits or cake) Please just go into the hall and let the person on the desk know you have come for refreshments only.
properties.title: Holsworthy Food Hub at Holsworthy Methodist Church

properties.description: Library is open for public access to books, Wi-Fi, printing, jigsaws and free warm drinks. Additional winter opening hours are Friday mornings 10am - 1pm. Activities are also available as advertised. Usual opening hours. Mon 2pm-5pm, Tues closed, Wednesday 10am - 6pm, Thursday 10am - 5pm, Saturday 10am -1pm.
properties.title: Holsworthy Library

properties.address: Holsworthy Methodist Church,, Holsworthy, Devon EX22 6BB
properties.description: The weekly Friendship Group is a warm, open space held on Church Premises. It runs on a Thursday afternoon throughout the year, is open to anyone and everyone, is free and offers a social space, games, refreshments (always cake!), occasional speakers, information on other services in the area and a listening ear.
properties.title: Holsworthy Methodist Church

properties.address: Whitstone Methodist Chapel, Holsworthy, Cornwall EX22 6TY
properties.description: Coffee Morning on 1st Monday of each month from 10.30 - 12.00 noon. Hall is next door to the village shop.A warm friendly welcome awaits you!
properties.title: Whitstone Methodist Hall

properties.address: Neetside Community Centre, Leven Road, Bude, Cornwall, EX23 8LB
